record.name: PBM KE set completion code to be null

rule.condition: closure.code in $L.file="Abandoned" or closure.code in $L.file="Duplicate Problem"
rule.conditionDesc: ( closure.code in CurrentRecord = "Abandoned" OR closure.code in CurrentRecord = "Duplicate Problem")
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Closure Code">closure.code</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Abandoned</Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Closure Code">closure.code</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Duplicate Problem</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Completion Code to be cleared (when ( closure.code in CurrentRecord = "Abandoned" OR closure.code in CurrentRecord = "Duplicate Problem"))
Run the "Known Error Close" wizard. (when ( Expression: true))
